theory_block.content_md: Backshift в reported questions такой же, как в утверждениях: Present -> Past, Past -> Past Perfect, will -> would.\n\nПример: "Are you coming?" -> She asked if I was coming.

examples.text: "Did you see it?" he asked. -> He asked if I had seen it.
examples.translation: "Ты это видел?" — спросил он. -> Он спросил, видел ли я это.
